snippet.title: A: data.frame slicing
snippet.description: to frustration. snippet.title: Q: data.frame slicing
snippet.description: I hope this question is not too simple for this board. I have created a data.frame df: CAS Name CID 89 13010-47-4 Lomustine 3950 90 130209-82-4 Latanoprost …
